definitions.definition: to stop someone or something from being killed, injured, or destroyed:
examples: Wearing seat belts has saved many lives.

definitions.definition: to stop someone from being killed
to help someone escape from a difficult or unpleasant situation:
examples: Thanks for helping me with that report - you saved my life!

definitions.definition: in football or similar games, when a player stops the ball from going into the goal when it is hit or kicked by a player from the other team:
examples: The goalkeeper made a great save in the last minute of the game.
They found all the lost documents save one.
